Texts.Chs: 试着放一些种子进去，并等待一会。你很快就会得到一些基因，用以在^orange;温室^reset;创造^green;新的植物品种^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Try tossing some seeds in there, and wait a bit. You'll soon get some genes that you can stockpile to create ^green;new types of plants^reset; in the ^orange;Greenhouse.^reset;

Texts.Chs: ^orange;植物分析台^reset;和^orange;基因提取器^reset;是非常有用的设备，可以从任何种类的植物种子中提取原始基因。你肯定很需要这些设备，所以^orange;现在就去建造一个^orange;植物分析台^reset;吧^reset;。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Sprouting Tables^reset; and ^orange;Xeno Labs^reset; are useful devices that extract raw genes from plant seeds of any sort. You will most certainly require them, so ^orange;go ahead and make a ^orange;Sprouting Table^reset; now^reset;.
